summary: Filter out flow reads that have invalid TP values

arguments.summary: maxHmer to use for testing in the filter
arguments.name: --read-filter-max-hmer

description:
A read filter to test if the TP values for each hmer in a flow based read form
 are wihin the allowed range (being the possible lengths of hmers - maxHmer)
name: FlowBasedTPAttributeValidReadFilter
